    • Method Detail

      • computeStreamability

        public PostureAndSweep computeStreamability(ContextItemStaticInfoEE contextInfo,
                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> reasons)
        Get the sweep and posture of this expression as defined in the W3C streamability specifications. This provides an assessment of stylesheet code against the W3C criteria for guaranteed streamability, and is implemented to allow these criteria to be tested. It is not the case that all expression that emerge as streamable from this analysis are currently capable of being streamed by Saxon
        Overrides:
        computeStreamability in class StreamingAdjunct
        Parameters:
        contextInfo - information about the context item type and posture
        reasons - the caller may supply a list, in which case the implementation may add to this
        Returns:
        the posture and sweep of the expression
